name: Agatha the Healer
description:
[ENG] Your village is struck by a strange disease. You must gather the ingredients to craft a remedy. As a white mage, you cannot go to dangerous areas, but courageous heroes, with various motivations, will accompany you.

Solve the puzzles and collect the plants needed to save the sick.

Made with RPG Maker MZ.

Program : JackFury

Narrative design : Laurent Pendarias

Dedication : This game is dedicated to courageous caregivers who have faced covid on the front line.
